episode_event_general_autumn_2021/6701_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed into the
woods to gather mushrooms with some friends.

Along the way, they ran into an unexpected
sync pair.
Huh? Look, it’s Red!

Red, the legendary Trainer, is hunting
for mushrooms?

He looks a bit worried, though... Maybe we should
go talk to him!
Um... Hullo! Need any help?

Hmm... That Snorlax over there is yours, isn’t it?
It looks like it might be hungry.
I knew it!

That’s impressive, Mallow! Leave it to a chef
to know when someone needs a meal!
Have you ran out of snacks to give your Snorlax?

That makes sense! Snorlax are famous for being
big eaters!

Yeah! I read in my Pokédex that it’s not satisfied
unless it eats over 880 pounds of food a day!

I see... So that’s why you’re here looking
for mushrooms!

But...I’m guessing you aren’t finding enough
mushrooms to feed Snorlax?

I’ve heard there’s a forest in Kanto where you can
find tons of Berries...

But finding Berries is a little different from
mushroom hunting... Maybe that’s what you’re
having trouble with?

I’ve got an idea! Why don’t we give them some of
the mushrooms we’ve picked?

Good idea! We picked a whole bunch, and it’s
important to share the bounty that nature
provides us!

Yeah! Plus, being hungry is no fun at all. I know
what that can be like...
Snorlax doesn’t even look close to being full yet.
And we ended up feeding it our entire stash...

No problem! We’ll just have to go searching for
more mushrooms, then!

Yeah! And I bet if we asked some sync pairs with
mushroom-like Pokémon...

They’d know some spots where we could find a
whole bunch of them? Great thinking!

My guess is we might get challenged to some
battles along the way, so we should be prepared
for that.

No need to thank us, Red! How could we let a
Pokémon go hungry?

Let’s feed Snorlax till he’s so stuffed, he can’t eat
another bite!
